exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: there is a cave bear at the mouth of an opening in the rocks, you do not approach. it is dangerous here.
investigationDescription: the beast glares at you. it notices you now. time to leave, while you still can.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

investigationDescription: the beast glares at you. it notices you now. time to leave, while you still can.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: there is a cave bear at the mouth of an opening in the rocks, you do not approach. it is dangerous here.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: there is a cave bear at the mouth of an opening in the rocks. Ohm signals you to stop. they brandish their spear. it looks like they are forming a plan.
investigationDescription: the beast glares at you. it takes a step towards you and lets out a low, menacing growl.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the bear from earlier is nowhere to be seen, but this is still its home. it is not safe.
investigationDescription: you see the hollow where the bear lives, visions of its deadly claws flashing through your mind. you dare not get close enough to see if it is still around.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the beast should be sleeping by now, but the rocky footing is especially treacherous in the dark. a broken leg would mean slow death.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate the terrain.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the beast should be sleeping by now, but the rocky footing is especially treacherous in the dark. a broken leg would mean slow death.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate the terrain.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the beast should be sleeping by now, but the rocky footing is especially treacherous in the dark. a broken leg would mean slow death.
investigationDescription: you cannot see well enough to navigate the terrain.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the rocky ground is harsh upon your feet. the beast must still be slumbering. you do not see it, but you also should not be here alone.
investigationDescription: best not stay and look around while alone. a charging bear will catch a human in the best of circumstances.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the bear is near, you feel you should return to the hunt.
investigationDescription: you do not feel compelled to look around, it is time for the hunt.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south
the watering hole lies to the south
the watering hole lies to the south

description: the rocky ground is harsh upon your feet. the unsure footing could lead to an accident, and brutal death.
investigationDescription: you don't have the energy to look around and carry the carcass. you should head home.

exits.description: the watering hole lies to the south

description: the rocky ground is harsh upon your feet. the unsure footing could lead to an accident, and it is harder to see in the night.
investigationDescription: it is too dark to see more. you need to look for Tei.
